required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of the Use of Apple Watch Features for Identification of Cardiac Arrhythmias
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of the Use of Apple Watch Features for Identification of Cardiac Arrhythmias

brief_summary.textblock: This post-marketing study is conducted to characterize the ability of Apple Watch rhythm analysis software to identify Atrial Fibrillation (AF) and facilitate subsequent clinical evaluation among users who contact AppleCare.

primary_outcome.measure: Atrial Fibrillation or Atrial Flutter (AF) of at least 30 seconds duration
primary_outcome.time_frame: During ambulatory ECG Monitoring (up to 8 days)
primary_outcome.description: Detected on ambulatory ECG patch monitor for a participant who received an IRN or Apple Watch ECG app - AFib classification

secondary_outcome.time_frame: During ambulatory ECG Monitoring (up to 8 days)
secondary_outcome.description: Detected on an ambulatory ECG patch monitor for a participant who received an IRN or Apple Watch ECG app - AFib classification

intervention.description: Eligible participants are asked to wear the ambulatory ECG monitor

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Possession of the following at time of eligibility screening:
- iPhone (5s or later) with iOS version 12.1.1 or later defined as iPhone model/iOS version used to complete screening eligibility.
- Apple Watch (Series 1-4) with watchOS version 5.1.2 or later defined as Apple Watch model/watchOS paired with iPhone used to complete screening eligibility
2. At least one of the following by self-report before consent:
- Irregular Rhythm Notification
- ECG app classification of Atrial Fibrillation
- ECG app classification of Inconclusive defined as "Inconclusive," "Heart Rate Over 120," or "Heart Rate Under 50"
3. Age â‰¥ 22 years at time of eligibility screening
4. Current resident of the United States at time of eligibility screening, and will reside in the United States for the length of the study
5. Proficient in written and spoken English
6. Valid phone number associated with iPhone, ascertained from self-report
7. Valid email address, ascertained from self-report
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Shared iCloud account
2. Shared AppleWatch
